title: Ticket #7830: Do not allow enduser to directly remove or edit JobSet ads in schedd
description: Job set ads have persistent ads in the job queue log with ids of 0.-<setid>. These ads contain an Owner attribute, so a client can only modify set ads that pertain to their own jobs. However, at this time we do not want end users directly editing or removing job set ads, as the schedd itself manages the creation and removal of these ads.
remarks:
2020-Oct-19 13:20:51 by tannenba:
As this fixes a theoretical concern from a code review regarding an issue in a mechanism which has not yet been documented for public consumption (job sets), a version history blurb is not desired. Resolving this ticket.
